actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the Galveston Channel forty-foot project for navigation in Galveston Bay, Texas.

summary.text: Modifies the Galveston Channel, Texas, navigation project to provide that non-Federal interests contribute 25 percent of the costs for disposal sites. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to waive such non-Federal contribution upon a finding by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency that: (1) the State, political subdivisions, and industrial concerns are participating in an approved plan for waste treatment facilities; and (2) applicable water quality standards are not being violated.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Galveston Channel forty-foot project for navigation in Galveston Bay, Texas.
